regen.absent_element: specification for handling cases where an Entity is deleted or modified after being linked to a document
regen.new_specification: The system shall update or remove links to Entities that have been deleted or modified, and notify the user of such changes when they attempt to retrieve a document with outdated Entity connections.
The system shall provide a mechanism for the user to assign a name to the document before saving it with its Entity connections.

regen.absent_element: specification for handling document naming in the GUI
regen.new_specification: The system shall provide a field in the special GUI for the user to input a name for the document, and this name shall be saved along with the document and its Entity connections.

label: The user may optionally specify a descriptive name for the document.
